keyMoments.title: Magma Overpowers Fire
keyMoments.description: The Magu Magu no Mi is revealed to be superior to the Mera Mera no Mi, as magma burns at temperatures hot enough to consume and overpower fire itself.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the hierarchy among Devil Fruits - even within the same Logia category, some fruits have natural advantages over others based on scientific principles.

keyMoments.title: Highest Offensive Power Among Devil Fruits
keyMoments.description: The episode demonstrates why the Magu Magu no Mi is said to have the highest offensive capability of any Devil Fruit, with its ability to burn even fire.
keyMoments.significance: Reinforces Akainu's status as one of the most dangerous combatants in the One Piece world.

keyMoments.title: Fatal Blow to Ace
keyMoments.description: The Magu Magu no Mi's magma pierces through Ace's chest, burning his vital organs beyond recovery.
keyMoments.significance: The power that can burn even fire claims the life of Fire Fist Ace, proving its devastating lethality.

abilities.description: Akainu launches massive magma fists at his opponents, creating devastating explosions of molten rock.
The Magu Magu no Mi's magma can consume and overpower fire-based attacks due to its superior temperature.

reveals.information: The Magu Magu no Mi is superior to the Mera Mera no Mi - magma can burn fire
Possesses the highest offensive power among all Devil Fruits according to official sources

keyMoments.title: Fire Fist Consumed by Magma
keyMoments.description: Ace's signature Fire Fist attack is completely consumed and overpowered by Akainu's magma, revealing the fundamental disadvantage of the Mera Mera no Mi against the Magu Magu no Mi.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that Ace's primary offensive ability is useless against Akainu, leaving him defenseless in direct combat.

abilities.description: Ace launches a massive column of fire shaped like a fist at his opponent. Revealed in this episode to be ineffective against magma.

reveals.information: The Mera Mera no Mi's flames are inferior to the Magu Magu no Mi's magma and can be consumed by it
